            var account_id=139802,
            settings_tolerance=2000,
            library_tolerance=2500,
            use_existing_jquery=false,
            // DO NOT EDIT BELOW THIS LINE
            f=false,d=document;return{use_existing_jquery:function(){return use_existing_jquery;},library_tolerance:function(){return library_tolerance;},finish:function(){if(!f){f=true;var a=d.getElementById('_vis_opt_path_hides');if(a)a.parentNode.removeChild(a);}},finished:function(){return f;},load:function(a){var b=d.createElement('script');b.src=a;b.type='text/javascript';b.innerText;b.onerror=function(){_vwo_code.finish();};d.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(b);},init:function(){settings_timer=setTimeout('_vwo_code.finish()',settings_tolerance);var a=d.createElement('style'),b='body{opacity:0 !important;filter:alpha(opacity=0) !important;background:none !important;}',h=d.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];a.setAttribute('id','_vis_opt_path_hides');a.setAttribute('type','text/css');if(a.styleSheet)a.styleSheet.cssText=b;else a.appendChild(d.createTextNode(b));h.appendChild(a);this.load('//dev.visualwebsiteoptimizer.com/j.php?a='+account_id+'&u='+encodeURIComponent(d.URL)+'&r='+Math.random());return settings_timer;}};}());_vwo_settings_timer=_vwo_code.init();

(function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':
		new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
		j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=
		'//www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
		})(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-KJVX');

    IOP_DATA.Portlet = [{"id":"85a73bbe-9ea1-4f1d-9c0a-9e76d316259a","message":"We're currently updating our technical systems. During this time you may experience intermittent outages of the SKY websites. We apologise for the inconvenience.","title":"Systems Update: ","scope":"global","type":"notification"}];


    <div class="iop-modal-general">
        <h3>{{notificationCtrl.modal.title}}</h3>
        <div class="iop-modal-details">{{notificationCtrl.modal.message}}</div>
        <div class="iop-modal-buttons">
            <div ng-repeat="command in notificationCtrl.modal.commands">
                <button ng-if="$first || !$last" class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" ng-click="notificationCtrl.dismissModal(command.dismisser)">{{command.name}}</button>
                <a ng-if="!$first && $last" class="" ng-click="notificationCtrl.dismissModal(command.dismisser)">{{command.name}}</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

SKY NETWORK TELEVISION 
PRIVACY POLICY
 

1. PRIVACY STATEMENT

Your privacy: SKY Network Television Limited ("SKY") is committed to ensuring the privacy of your information, and will hold all personal information collected in association with SKY in accordance with the requirements of the Privacy Act 1993.
Information: This Privacy Policy applies to:
	
personal information submitted by you on this website and otherwise in the course of using or applying for any SKY services related, associated with, or connected to, this website, SKY competitions and promotions or SKY offers (the "SKY services"); and
any information automatically retrieved during visits to this website.


Your consent: By accessing and browsing this website and/or using or applying for the SKY services, you consent to the collection, use, disclosure, storage and processing of your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
Changes to Privacy Policy: We may modify, alter or otherwise update this Privacy Policy from time to time, with or without notice to you. Such amendments will be effective immediately upon the posting of the amended Privacy Policy on this website. You agree to check this Privacy Policy and to be bound by the Privacy Policy that is in effect at the time you access this website.

 2. WHAT THIS PRIVACY POLICY COVERS

This Privacy Policy covers the following:
	
Collection, use and disclosure of personal information;
Access to, editing and deleting personal information;
Storage and processing of personal information;
Cookies and automatically retrieved information;
Account security; and
Links to external websites.



 3. COLLECTION, USE AND DISCLOSURE OF PERSONAL INFORMATION

Visitors: You may browse and access information contained on this website without providing personally identifiable information. However, some information is automatically retrieved while you visit this website. You agree that SKY may collect information about you and/or your household (including information about the products and services that you and/or your household use) from time to time from you and from other services and by other means.
Personal information: To register or apply for certain SKY services (on this website or by other means), you may need to submit personal information such as your email address, name, physical address, telephone number, gender and date of birth. You may be asked to submit further information via this website or other means from time to time.
Use of information: Your personal information will only be used to:
	
assess and process your application for SKY services, including by sharing your personal information with third party agencies for the purposes of credit check analysis; and/or
provide the SKY services to you; and/or
verify that you are entitled to register as a SKY subscriber and otherwise comply with this Privacy Policy and any other applicable SKY terms and conditions; and/or
communicate with you and/or your household in relation to this website, the SKY services, and/or your Sky subscription; and/or
keep you informed of and promote current or planned products and/or services of SKY (including DVD Unlimited and Prime Television), and our selected business partners; and/or
conduct market research and generate and provide statistical analysis and rating information; and/or
conduct credit control and debt collection activities (including logging overdue debts owed to Sky with credit reference agencies).


Disclosure of information: Unless you have authorised us to do so, SKY will not rent or sell your personal information and will not disclose it to any third party except:
	
where disclosure is connected to the purposes for which the information was collected as listed in clause 3.3;
to our service providers, credit reference and debt collection agencies, communications and network operators and selected business partners;
to relevant authorities, parties and/or applicable intellectual property rights holders (or their representatives) if we consider that you are in breach of SKY's rights; or
where required, or permitted, by law.



 4. ACCESS TO, EDITING AND DELETING PERSONAL INFORMATION

Access: You may ask to see the personal information that SKY holds about you at any time by contacting us or by viewing your details at your account page.
Editing and deleting: You may also ask SKY to correct, alter or delete any personal information that we hold about you by contacting us. Alternatively you are able to do this yourself at your account page.

 5. STORAGE AND PROCESSING OF PERSONAL INFORMATION

Storage and processing: SKY will store and process your personal information in New Zealand or in any other country in which SKY or our selected business partners maintain facilities for doing so. Your personal information may therefore be transferred outside of New Zealand.
Retention: SKY will hold your personal information both before and after the termination or cancellation of your SKY subscription (and may use it in accordance with clause 3.3, as applicable) but only for as long as we are lawfully entitled to use that information.

 6. COOKIES AND AUTOMATICALLY RETRIEVED INFORMATION

Cookies: When you enter this website your computer will automatically be issued with a cookie. These are text files that identify your computer to our server, so that when you visit the website again, the cookie will identify your computer to SKY's web server. This allows us to improve the speed and reliability of this website and provide you with a better service. Cookies in themselves do not identify individual users and are not used to collect or store personal information about you. Visitors have the ability to set their computers to notify them when a cookie is issued, or to reject any cookies, but the latter means that certain SKY services will not be provided to the visitor.
Automatically retrieved information: Some information may be automatically retrieved while you access and browse this website including:
	
the features that you use, the pages that you visit and the actions that you take on this website;
your IP address (i.e. the location of your computer on the internet);
the domain name that you are accessing the internet from; and
the browser and search engine (if any) that your computer uses.


Purposes: The information automatically retrieved is used in statistical and aggregate formats to assess the effectiveness of and improve this website and the SKY services, and to determine our visitors' preferences and interests.

 7. ACCOUNT SECURITY

SKY security: To prevent unauthorised access, maintain data accuracy and ensure the appropriate use of any information supplied by you, SKY has put in place physical, electronic and managerial processes to protect your information. Additionally, all user information stored on this website is protected from unauthorised access through the use of secure login information and other security procedures.
Your security: You must keep any login, password or account information relating to your use of this website secure at all times.

 8. LINKS TO EXTERNAL WEBSITES

Privacy: This website contains links to external websites. SKY is not responsible for the privacy policies of any such external websites. This Privacy Policy applies solely to information collected by SKY.

    <div class="iop-media-action-modal" ng-init="item = notificationCtrl.modal.item">
        <span ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.action === 'record'" class="iop-media-action-icon icon-iop-record"></span>
        <span ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.action === 'remind'" class="iop-media-action-icon icon-iop-remind"></span>
        <span ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.action === 'share'" class="iop-media-action-icon icon-iop-share"></span>
        <h3 ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.title">{{ ::notificationCtrl.modal.title }}</h3>

        <div class="iop-modal-details">
            <div class="iop-media-action-head" ng-class="::{ 'has-channel-image': item.channelLogo }">
                <div class="channel-logo" ng-if="::item.channelLogo">
                    <div>
                        <img class="channel-image" ng-src="{{ ::item.channelLogo | checkForCdn }}" ng-alt="{{ ::item.channelName }}"/>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div>
                    <h4>{{ ::item.title }} <span ng-if="::item.rating && item.rating !== 'null'">({{ ::item.rating }})</span></h4>
                    <h4>
                        <span ng-if="::item.start">{{ ::item.start | date:"EEEE d MMM" }}</span>
                        <span ng-if="::item.start">{{ ::item.start | date:"h:mma" }}<span ng-if="item.end"> - {{ ::item.end | date:"h:mma" }}</span></span>
                        <span ng-if="::item.channelName">{{ ::item.channelName }}</span>
                        <span ng-if="::item.channel">Channel {{ ::item.channel }}</span>
                    </h4>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="decoders iop-media-action-body" ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.action === 'record' && !notificationCtrl.modal.requirement">
                <button type="button" ng-disabled="::!decoder.recordingCapable" ng-repeat="decoder in ::notificationCtrl.modal.decoders" class="iop-btn iop-btn-secondary" ng-click="::notificationCtrl.modal.selectDecoder(decoder)">
                    {{ ::decoder.displayName }} <span ng-if="::decoder.decoderType">({{ ::decoder.marketingName }})</span><br/>
                    <em>Smartcard No. {{ ::decoder.smartcardNumber }} <span ng-if="::!decoder.recordingCapable">- Recording not available</span></em>
                </button>
            </div>

            <div class="decoders iop-media-action-body" ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.action === 'remind' && !notificationCtrl.modal.requirement">
                <div ng-if="::!notificationCtrl.modal.decoders.length">
                    <p>Sorry, you do not have any registered boxes.</p>
                    <a class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" ng-if="::notificationCtrl.modal.upgradeUrl" ng-href="{{ ::(notificationCtrl.modal.upgradeUrl + '#boxes') }}">Upgrade</a>
                </div>
                <button type="button" ng-repeat="decoder in ::notificationCtrl.modal.decoders track by $index" class="iop-btn iop-btn-secondary" ng-click="::notificationCtrl.modal.selectDecoder(decoder)">
                    {{ ::decoder.displayName }} <span ng-if="::decoder.decoderType">({{ ::decoder.marketingName }})</span><br/>
                    <em>Smartcard No. {{ ::decoder.smartcardNumber }}</em>
                </button>
            </div>

            <div class="upgrade iop-media-action-body" ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.requirement === 'decoder'">
                <p>
                    Upgrade to MY SKY to pause, rewind and record live TV. <em class="title">{{ ::item.title }}</em>.
                </p>
                <a class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" ng-if="::notificationCtrl.modal.upgradeUrl" ng-href="{{ ::(notificationCtrl.modal.upgradeUrl + '#boxes') }}">Upgrade to MY SKY</a>
            </div>


            <div class="upgrade iop-media-action-body" ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.requirement === 'upgrade'">
                <div ng-if="::item.channelProduct.name">
                    
                        <p>
                            Add {{ ::item.channelProduct.name }} to your package to watch <em class="title">{{ ::item.title }}</em>.
                        </p>
                    
                    <div class="highlight-container" ng-if="::item.channelProduct.imageUrl">
                        <img class="channel-image" ng-src="{{ ::item.channelProduct.imageUrl | checkForCdn }}" alt="{{ ::item.channelProduct.name }}"/>
                    </div>
                    <a class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" ng-if="::notificationCtrl.modal.upgradeUrl" ng-href="{{ ::(notificationCtrl.modal.upgradeUrl + '?sku=' + item.channelProduct.sku) }}">Upgrade</a>
                </div>
                <div>
                    
                        <p>
                            Add {{ ::item.channelName || ('Channel ' + item.channel) }} to your package to watch <em class="title">{{ ::item.title }}</em>.
                        </p>
                    
                    <div class="highlight-container" ng-if="::item.channelLogo">
                        <img class="channel-image" ng-src="{{ ::item.channelLogo | checkForCdn }}" alt="{{ ::item.channelName }}"/>
                    </div>
                    <a class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" ng-if="::notificationCtrl.modal.upgradeUrl" ng-href="{{ ::notificationCtrl.modal.upgradeUrl }}">Add Channel</a>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="account iop-media-action-body container" ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.requirement === 'link' || notificationCtrl.modal.requirement === 'login'">
                <div class="account-option grid-5 grid-mobile-4">
                    <div class="account-explanation">Already a customer?</div>
                    <a class="iop-btn iop-btn-secondary" ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.requirement === 'login'" ng-href="{{ ::'/allow_rdrct?sky_redirect=/privacy-statement&eventId=' + item.id }}">Sign In / Register</a>
                    <a class="iop-btn iop-btn-secondary" ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.requirement === 'link'" href="/myaccount">Link Your Account</a>
                </div>
                <div class="account-alternative grid-2 grid-mobile-4">or</div>
                <div class="account-option grid-5 grid-mobile-4">
                    <div class="account-explanation">Join SKY</div>
                    <a class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" href="/subscribe">Get SKY</a>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="upgrade iop-media-action-body" ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.requirement === 'n/a'">
                
                    <p>Sorry, as a Vodafone customer you cannot book remote recordings from this site.</p>
                
                
                    <button type="button" class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" ng-click="notificationCtrl.dismissModal()">Close</button>
                
            </div>
        </div>
        
    </div>


<div class="iop-media-action-modal" ng-init="item = notificationCtrl.modal.item">
   <span class="iop-media-action-icon icon-iop-ticket"></span>
   <h3 ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.title">{{ notificationCtrl.modal.title }}</h3>
   <div class="iop-modal-details">
      <div class="iop-media-action-head" ng-class="::{ 'has-channel-image': item.channelLogo }">
         <div class="channel-logo" ng-if="::item.channelLogo">
            <div>
               <img class="channel-image" ng-src="{{ ::item.channelLogo | checkForCdn }}" ng-alt="{{ ::item.channelName }}"/>
            </div>
         </div>
         <div>
            <h4>{{ ::item.title }} <span ng-if="::item.rating && item.rating !== 'null'">({{ ::item.rating }})</span></h4>
            <h4>
               <span ng-if="::item.price">{{ ::item.price |  centsAsDollars }}</span>
               <span ng-if="::item.duration">Duration {{ ::item.duration / 60000 }}mins</span>
               <span ng-if="::item.channel">Channel {{ ::item.channel }}</span>
            </h4>
         </div>
         <div class="iop-media-action-synopsis" ng-if="::item.synopsis">
            <p class="body-2">{{ ::item.synopsis }}</p>
         </div>
      </div>
      <div class="process-booking" ng-show="notificationCtrl.modal.bookingInProgress">
         
            <div class="process-booking-message">
               Your booking request is being processed.
            </div>
         
      </div>
      <div ng-show="!notificationCtrl.modal.bookingInProgress">
         <div class="iop-media-action-body ppv-purchased" ng-if="::notificationCtrl.modal.currentBookings.length &gt; 0">
            <div class="ppv-review">
               <h4><span class="icon-iop icon-iop-checked"></span>Content you have already booked</h4>
              <div ng-if="item.type != 'LIVE'">  
               <div ng-repeat="booking in ::notificationCtrl.modal.currentBookings track by $index">
                  <div class="container">
                     <div ng-if="booking.decoder" class="grid-12">
                        <p class="ppv-decoder"><strong>{{ ::booking.decoder.nickname }} <span ng-if="::booking.decoder.decoderType">({{ ::booking.decoder.decoderType }})</span></strong> <span ng-if="::booking.decoder.smartcardNumber">- Smartcard No. {{ ::booking.decoder.smartcardNumber }}</span></p>
                     </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="container ppv-watch" ng-repeat="item in ::booking.offering track by $index">
                     <div class="grid-3 grid-mobile-4">
                        <p>{{ ::item.startDate | date :  "EEEE d" }}</p>
                     </div>
                     <div class="grid-9 grid-mobile-4">
                        <p>
                           <span ng-repeat="time in ::item.showings track by $index">{{ ::time.startDate | date : "h:mma" | lowercase }} <em ng-if="::time.replay">(replay)</em></span>
                        </p>
                     </div>
                  </div>
               </div>
            </div>
            <div ng-if="item.type == 'LIVE'">  
                  <div class="container ppv-watch" ng-repeat="item in ::notificationCtrl.modal.currentBookings[0].offering track by $index">
                     <div class="grid-3 grid-mobile-4">
                        <p>{{ ::item.startDate | date :  "EEEE d" }}</p>
                     </div>
                     <div class="grid-9 grid-mobile-4">
                        <p>
                           <span ng-repeat="time in ::item.showings track by $index">{{ ::time.startDate | date : "h:mma" | lowercase }} <em ng-if="::time.replay">(replay)</em></span>
                        </p>
                     </div>
                  </div>
            </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="ppv iop-media-action-body" ng-if="!notificationCtrl.modal.requirement">
            <form name="ppvBookForm" novalidate ng-submit="skyLinkingCtrl.submit()">
               <div ng-if="!notificationCtrl.modal.isReview">
                  <div class="container">
                     
                        <div class="grid-12">
                           <label class="header-4" for="iopmediaactions_WAR_iopaccountportlet_INSTANCE_footer1-ppvSelectDecoder">Please select a SKY box and viewing time.</label>
                        </div>
                     
                     <div class="grid-12">
                        <div class="material-select">
                           <select id="iopmediaactions_WAR_iopaccountportlet_INSTANCE_footer1-ppvSelectDecoder" name="ppvSelectDecoder" ng-model="notificationCtrl.modal.selectedDecoder" ng-options="decoder.formattedName for decoder in notificationCtrl.modal.decoders" required>
                              <option value="" disabled="true">Select a SKY box</option>
                           </select>
                        </div>
                     </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="container">
                     <div class="grid-6 grid-mobile-4">
                        <div class="material-select">
                           <select id="iopmediaactions_WAR_iopaccountportlet_INSTANCE_footer1-ppvSelectDate" name="ppvSelectDate" ng-model="notificationCtrl.modal.selectedDay" ng-options="day.formattedDay for day in notificationCtrl.modal.offerings" required>
                              <option value="" disabled="true">Select a day</option>
                           </select>
                        </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="grid-6 grid-mobile-4">
                        <div class="material-select">
                           <select id="iopmediaactions_WAR_iopaccountportlet_INSTANCE_footer1-ppvSelectTime" name="ppvSelectTime" ng-model="notificationCtrl.modal.selectedShowing" ng-options="day.formattedTime for day in notificationCtrl.modal.showsForDay(notificationCtrl.modal.selectedDay)" required>
                              <option value="" disabled="true">Select a time</option>
                           </select>
                        </div>
                     </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="container ppv-contentlisting ppv-review" ng-show="notificationCtrl.modal.selectedShowing.contentListing && notificationCtrl.modal.selectedShowing.contentListing.length > 0">
                     <div class="grid-12">
                        
                           <p class="header-5">Programming during this viewing</p>
                        
                        <div class="body-2 wysiwyg">
                           <ul>
                              <li ng-repeat="contentListing in notificationCtrl.modal.selectedShowing.contentListing track by $index">{{ notificationCtrl.modal.formattedContent(contentListing) }}</li>
                           </ul>
                        </div>
                     </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="container">
                     <div class="grid-12">
                        <button type="button" class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" ng-click="notificationCtrl.modal.review(notificationCtrl.modal)" ng-disabled="ppvBookForm.$invalid">Review Booking</button>
                     </div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.isReview && !notificationCtrl.modal.alreadyBooked">
                  <div class="ppv-review">
                     
                        <h4>Please review and confirm your booking:</h4>
                     
                    <div ng-if="item.type != 'LIVE'">
                     <div class="container">
                        <div class="grid-3 grid-mobile-4">
                           <p class="header-5">SKY box</p>
                        </div>
                        <div class="grid-9 grid-mobile-4">
                           <p>{{ notificationCtrl.modal.selectedDecoder.formattedName }}</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                     </div>
                     
                        <div class="container">
                           <div class="grid-12">
                              <p class="header-5">Screening times you can watch</p>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                     
                     <div class="container ppv-watch" ng-repeat="item in notificationCtrl.modal.showingForTime(notificationCtrl.modal.selectedShowing) track by $index">
                        <div class="grid-3 grid-mobile-4">
                           <p>{{ item.startDate | date :  "EEEE d" }}</p>
                        </div>
                        <div class="grid-9 grid-mobile-4">
                           <p>
                              <span ng-repeat="time in item.showings track by $index" ng-class="{ 'selected': (!notificationCtrl.modal.noOptions && notificationCtrl.modal.selectedShowing.start === time.start) }">{{ time.startDate | date : "h:mma" | lowercase }} <em ng-if="time.replay">(replay)</em></span>
                           </p>
                        </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="container ppv-contentlisting ppv-review" ng-show="notificationCtrl.modal.selectedShowing.contentListing && notificationCtrl.modal.selectedShowing.contentListing.length > 0">
                        <div class="grid-12">
                           
                              <p class="header-5">Programming during this viewing</p>
                           
                           <div class="body-2 wysiwyg">
                              <ul>
                                 <li ng-repeat="contentListing in notificationCtrl.modal.selectedShowing.contentListing track by $index">{{ notificationCtrl.modal.formattedContent(contentListing) }}</li>
                              </ul>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="container ppv-terms">
                        <div class="grid-12">
                           <p class="header-5">Terms and Conditions</p>
                           
                           <p class="body-2">Your SKY account will be debited <strong>{{ ::item.price |  centsAsDollars }} immediately</strong>.
                        </div>
                     </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="container" ng-if="!notificationCtrl.modal.noOptions">
                     <div class="grid-6 grid-mobile-4">
                        <button type="button" class="iop-btn iop-btn-secondary" ng-click="notificationCtrl.modal.change(notificationCtrl.modal)">Change booking</button>
                     </div>
                     <div class="grid-6 grid-mobile-4">
                        <button type="button" class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" ng-click="notificationCtrl.modal.book(notificationCtrl.modal)">Make booking</button>
                     </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="container" ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.noOptions">
                     <div class="grid-12 grid-mobile-4">
                        <button type="button" class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" ng-click="notificationCtrl.modal.book(notificationCtrl.modal)">Make booking</button>
                     </div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.isReview && notificationCtrl.modal.alreadyBooked">
                  
                     <p>You have already booked this content on this SKY box.</p>
                  
                  <div class="container" ng-if="!notificationCtrl.modal.noOptions">
                     <div class="grid-6 grid-mobile-4">
                        <button type="button" class="iop-btn iop-btn-secondary" ng-click="notificationCtrl.modal.change(notificationCtrl.modal)">Change booking</button>
                     </div>
                     
                        <div class="grid-6 grid-mobile-4">
                           <button type="button" class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" ng-click="notificationCtrl.dismissModal()">Close</button>
                        </div>
                     
                  </div>
                  <div class="container" ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.noOptions">
                     
                        <button type="button" class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" ng-click="notificationCtrl.dismissModal()">Close</button>
                     
                  </div>
               </div>
            </form>
         </div>
         <div class="upgrade iop-media-action-body" ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.requirement === 'decoder'">
            <p>
               Upgrade your subscription to a SKY box capable of viewing Pay-Per-View content. <em class="title">{{ ::item.title }}</em>.
            </p>
            <a class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" ng-if="::notificationCtrl.modal.upgradeUrl" ng-href="{{ ::(notificationCtrl.modal.upgradeUrl + '#boxes') }}">Upgrade to MY SKY</a>
         </div>
         <div class="account iop-media-action-body container" ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.requirement === 'link' || notificationCtrl.modal.requirement === 'login'">
            <div class="account-option grid-5 grid-mobile-4">
               <div class="account-explanation">Already a customer?</div>
               <a class="iop-btn iop-btn-secondary" ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.requirement === 'login'" ng-href="{{ ::'/allow_rdrct?sky_redirect=/privacy-statement&ppvId=' + item.titleCode }}">Sign In / Register</a>
               <a class="iop-btn iop-btn-secondary" ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.requirement === 'link'" href="/myaccount">Link Your Account</a>
            </div>
            <div class="account-alternative grid-2 grid-mobile-4">or</div>
            <div class="account-option grid-5 grid-mobile-4">
               <div class="account-explanation">Join SKY</div>
               <a class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" href="/subscribe">Get SKY</a>
            </div>
         </div>
         <div class="upgrade iop-media-action-body" ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.requirement === 'blocked'">
            
               <p>You appear to have reached your pay-per-view purchase limit for the month, or your account is in arrears. Please contact us if you feel this is incorrect.</p>
            
            
               <button type="button" class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" ng-click="notificationCtrl.dismissModal()">Close</button>
            
         </div>
         <div class="upgrade iop-media-action-body" ng-if="notificationCtrl.modal.requirement === 'n/a'">
            
               <p>Sorry, as a Vodafone customer you cannot book Pay-Per-View events through this site.</p>
            
            
               <button type="button" class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" ng-click="notificationCtrl.dismissModal()">Close</button>
            
         </div>
      </div>
   </div>
</div>















        <div class="cart" ng-show="state">
            <h4 ng-if="!isUpgrade"><span class="icon-iop icon-iop-cart"></span> Shopping Cart</h4>
            <h4 ng-if="isUpgrade"><span class="icon-iop icon-iop-cart"></span> Upgrade Cart</h4>

            
                <div ng-if="cartSupport" class="cart-help cart-help-header">
                    <div id="rnCartChatTop" rn-conditional-chat="chatOptions"></div>
                </div>
            

            <div ng-switch="state">

                <div class="cart-content" ng-switch-when="loading">
                    <div class="cart-loading"></div>
                </div>


                <div class="cart-empty-content" ng-switch-when="error">
                    <div class="cart-placeholder cart-error">
                        <span class="icon-iop icon-iop-support-technical"></span>
                    </div>
                    <div>
                        
                            <p>We were unable to load your shopping cart. Please refresh the page or contact support.</p>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>


                <div class="cart-empty-content" ng-switch-when="empty">
                    <div class="cart-placeholder cart-empty">
                        <span class="icon-iop icon-iop-cart"></span>
                    </div>
                    
                        <h5 class="header-2">Your cart is empty</h5>
                    
                    <div ng-if="!isUpgrade">
                        
                            <p>Choose one of SKY's many services.</p>
                        
                        
                            <a ng-if="!primary" href="/subscribe" class="iop-btn iop-btn-secondary">Browse all products</a>
                        
                    </div>
                    <div ng-if="isUpgrade">
                        
                            <p>Select an upgrade to your SKY subscription.</p>
                        
                        
                            <a ng-if="!primary" href="/myaccount/upgrade" class="iop-btn iop-btn-secondary">Browse all upgrades</a>
                        
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="cart-title">
                    <h3>Subscription <span ng-if="isUpgrade">Upgrades</span></h3>
                </div>

                <div class="cart-content checkout-grid-8" ng-switch-when="not-empty">

                    <div class="container">

                        <div class="cart-listing">
                            

                            <div class="cart-group" ng-repeat="category in summary.categories track by $index">
                                <h4>{{category.name}}</h4>
                                <ul>
                                    <li ng-repeat="product in category.products track by $index" data-sku="{{product.sku}}">
                                        <span class="cart-item-name">
                                            {{product.name}}
                                            <span ng-if="product.qty &gt; 1">&times; {{product.qty}}</span>
                                            <a ng-if="product.removable && !readonly" ng-click="removeProduct(product.sku)" class="">remove</a>
                                        </span>
                                        <span class="cart-item-amount">{{product.price | currency:'$':2}}</span>
                                        <ul ng-if="product.components">
                                            <li ng-repeat="component in product.components track by $index">
                                                <span class="cart-item-name">{{component.name}}</span>
                                                <span class="cart-item-amount">{{component.price | currency:'$':2}}</span>
                                            </li>
                                        </ul>
                                        <p ng-if="product.discountDetail">
                                            {{ product.discountDetail }}
                                            <em>(normally {{product.priceOriginal | currency:'$':2}})</em>
                                        </p>
                                        <p ng-if="product.terms" class="body-2" ng-bind-html="product.terms | htmlNewlines"></p>
                                        <p ng-if="product.terms && product.link">
                                            <a class="iop-link link-indicator" target="_blank" ng-href="{{ product.link + '#offerTerms' | checkForCdn }}">See here for details</a>
                                        </p>
                                    </li>
                                </ul>
                            </div>

                            <div class="cart-group" ng-if="summary.selectedOffer">
                                <h4>Special Offer</h4>
                                <ul class="cart-monthly">
                                    <li ng-class="{'removed': isRemovingOffer}">
                                        <span class="cart-item-name">
                                            {{summary.selectedOffer.name}}
                                            <a ng-if="!readonly" ng-click="removeOffer()" class="">remove</a>
                                        </span>
                                        <p ng-if="summary.selectedOffer.subheading" class="active-offer-subheading">{{ summary.selectedOffer.subheading }}</p>
                                        <p ng-if="summary.selectedOffer.description" class="active-offer-description" ng-bind-html="summary.selectedOffer.description | htmlNewlines"></p>
                                        <p ng-if="summary.selectedOffer.terms" class="body-2" ng-bind-html="summary.selectedOffer.terms | htmlNewlines"></p>
                                        <p ng-if="summary.selectedOffer.link">
                                            <a class="iop-link link-indicator" target="_blank" ng-href="{{ summary.selectedOffer.link + '#offerTerms' | checkForCdn }}">See here for details</a>
                                        </p>
                                    </li>
                                </ul>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div ng-switch-when="not-empty" class="checkout-grid-4">
                    <div class="cart-content-sticky" sticky="{{ ::sticky }}" sticky-container-selector="#main-content" sticky-origin-selector=".iop-origin" sticky-cart-change="true" >
                        <div>
                            <div class="cart-content">
                                <div class="cart-totals">
                                    
                                    <div ng-if="summary.totals.dueToday">
                                        <h4>Total</h4>
                                        <ul>
                                            <li class="cart-total">
                                                <span class="cart-item-name">{{ summary.totals.dueToday.description }}</span>
                                                <span class="cart-item-amount">{{ summary.totals.dueToday.cost | currency:'$':2}}</span>
                                            </li>
                                        </ul>
                                    </div>
                                    <div ng-if="summary.totals.oneOffCost">
                                        <h4>One Off Costs</h4>
                                        <ul class="cart-monthly">
                                            <li>
                                                <span class="cart-item-name">{{ summary.totals.oneOffCost.description }}</span>
                                                <span class="cart-item-amount">{{ summary.totals.oneOffCost.cost | currency:'$':2 }}</span>
                                            </li>
                                        </ul>
                                    </div>
                                    <div ng-if="summary.totals.recurringCostNormal">
                                        <h4>Monthly Cost</h4>
                                        <ul class="cart-monthly">
                                            <li ng-if="summary.totals.recurringCostSpecial">
                                                <span class="cart-item-name">{{ summary.totals.recurringCostSpecial.description }}</span>
                                                <span class="cart-item-amount">{{ summary.totals.recurringCostSpecial.cost | currency:'$':2 }}</span>
                                            </li>
                                            <li>
                                                <span class="cart-item-name">{{ summary.totals.recurringCostNormal.description }}</span>
                                                <span class="cart-item-amount">{{ summary.totals.recurringCostNormal.cost | currency:'$':2 }}</span>
                                            </li>
                                        </ul>
                                    </div>
                                    <div class="cart-promo" ng-class="{ 'promo-active' : promoCodeActive }" ng-if="primary && !cart.activeOfferDecorator">
                                        <p ng-show="!promoCodeActive">
                                            <a ng-click="togglePromoCode()">Enter promo code</a>
                                        </p>
                                        <form name="applyPromoCodeForm" novalidate ng-submit="applyPromoCode(promoCode)" ng-show="promoCodeActive">
                                        <form name="applyPromoCodeForm" novalidate ng-submit="applyPromoCode(promoCode)" ng-show="promoCodeActive">
                                            <label for="promo-code-{{$id}}">Enter promo code</label>
                                            <input name="promoCode" ng-model="promoCode" id="promo-code-{{$id}}" type="text" focus-when="promoCodeActive" required />
                                            <button type="submit" class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" ng-disabled="applyPromoCodeForm.$invalid || isApplyingPromoCode">Apply</button>
                                        </form>
                                    </div>
                                </div>

                                <div class="cart-control">
                                    
                                        <form action="/subscribe/checkout" method="post" ng-if="!isUpgrade">
                                            <input type="hidden" name="checkout_order" value="true" />
                                            <button type="submit" class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary">Review</button>
                                        </form>
                                    
                                    
                                        <form action="/myaccount/upgrade/checkout" method="post" ng-if="isUpgrade">
                                            <input type="hidden" name="checkout_order" value="true" />
                                            <button type="submit" class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary">Review</button>
                                        </form>
                                    
                                    
                                        <button type="button" ng-if="!readonly" class="iop-btn iop-btn-secondary" ng-click="clear()">Clear</button>
                                    
                                </div>

                                
                                    <div ng-if="cartSupport" class="cart-help cart-help-footer">
                                        <div id="rnCartChatBottom" rn-conditional-chat="chatOptions"></div>
                                    </div>
                                
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
     

        <div class="cart-adjustment-modal">
            <div class="cart-offer-header">
                
                    <h3>Let's update your cart</h3>
                
                
                    <p>But first we need to make the following adjustments.</p>
                
            </div>
            <div class="cart-adjustment-details">
                <div ng-repeat="item in notificationCtrl.modal.addProducts track by $index" class="cart-adjustment-item cart-adjustment-add">
                    <p>Add <strong>{{item.name}}</strong></p>
                    <div ng-if="item.imageUrl && item.link" class="cart-adjustment-thumbnail">
                        <a ng-href="{{item.link | checkForCdn }}" target="_blank"><img ng-src="{{item.imageUrl | checkForCdn }}" ng-alt="{{item.name}}" /></a>
                    </div>
                    <div ng-if="item.imageUrl && !item.link" class="cart-adjustment-thumbnail">
                        <img ng-src="{{item.imageUrl | checkForCdn }}" ng-alt="{{item.name}}" />
                    </div>
                    <div ng-if="item.price" class="cart-adjustment-price">
                        <span>{{item.price | currency:'$':2}}</span>
                        <span ng-if="item.paymentType === 'RECURRING'">per month</span>
                        <span ng-if="item.paymentType !== 'RECURRING'">one off costs</span>
                    </div>
                    
                        <p ng-if="item.link">
                            <a ng-href="{{item.link | checkForCdn }}" target="_blank">Learn more</a>
                        </p>
                    
                </div>
                <div ng-repeat="item in notificationCtrl.modal.removeProducts track by $index" class="cart-adjustment-item cart-adjustment-remove">
                    <p>Remove <strong>{{item.name}}</strong></p>
                    <div ng-if="item.imageUrl && item.link" class="cart-adjustment-thumbnail">
                        <a ng-href="{{item.link | checkForCdn }}" target="_blank"><img ng-src="{{item.imageUrl | checkForCdn }}" ng-alt="{{item.name}}" /></a>
                    </div>
                    <div ng-if="item.imageUrl && !item.link" class="cart-adjustment-thumbnail">
                        <img ng-src="{{item.imageUrl | checkForCdn }}" ng-alt="{{item.name}}" />
                    </div>
                    <div ng-if="item.price" class="cart-adjustment-price">
                        <span>{{item.price | currency:'$':2}}</span>
                        <span ng-if="item.paymentType === 'RECURRING'">per month</span>
                        <span ng-if="item.paymentType !== 'RECURRING'">one off costs</span>
                    </div>
                    
                        <p ng-if="item.link">
                            <a ng-href="{{item.link | checkForCdn }}" target="_blank">Learn more</a>
                        </p>
                    
                </div>
                <div ng-repeat="item in notificationCtrl.modal.removeOffers track by $index" class="cart-adjustment-item cart-adjustment-remove">
                    <p>Remove offer <strong>{{item.name}}</strong></p>
                    <div ng-if="item.imageUrl && item.link" class="cart-adjustment-thumbnail">
                        <a ng-href="{{item.link | checkForCdn }}" target="_blank"><img ng-src="{{item.imageUrl | checkForCdn }}" ng-alt="{{item.name}}" /></a>
                    </div>
                    <div ng-if="item.imageUrl && !item.link" class="cart-adjustment-thumbnail">
                        <img ng-src="{{item.imageUrl | checkForCdn }}" ng-alt="{{item.name}}" />
                    </div>
                    
                        <p ng-if="item.link">
                            <a ng-href="{{item.link | checkForCdn }}" target="_blank">Learn more</a>
                        </p>
                    
                </div>
                
                    <p>Would you like to make these adjustments and continue?</p>
                
            </div>
            <div class="cart-modal-buttons">
                <button type="button" class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" ng-click="notificationCtrl.modal.adjustmentCallback()">Continue</button>
                <a ng-click="notificationCtrl.dismissModal(false)">No thanks, don't change the cart</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    

        <div class="cart-product-modal">
            <div class="cart-offer-header">
                
                    <h3>While you are at it</h3>
                
                
                    <p>We recommend subscribing to the following</p>
                
            </div>
            <div class="cart-offer-details" ng-class="{ 'cart-offer-multiple' : (notificationCtrl.modal.products && notificationCtrl.modal.products.length > 1)}">
                <div ng-repeat="item in notificationCtrl.modal.products track by $index" class="cart-offer">
                    <h4>{{item.name}}</h4>
                    <div ng-if="item.imageUrl && item.link" class="cart-offer-thumbnail">
                        <a ng-href="{{item.link | checkForCdn }}" target="_blank"><img ng-src="{{item.imageUrl | checkForCdn }}" ng-alt="{{item.name}}" /></a>
                    </div>
                    <div ng-if="item.imageUrl && !item.link" class="cart-offer-thumbnail">
                        <img ng-src="{{item.imageUrl | checkForCdn }}" ng-alt="{{item.name}}" /></a>
                    </div>
                    <div ng-if="item.price" class="cart-offer-price">
                        <span>{{item.price | currency:'$':2}}</span>
                        <span ng-if="item.paymentType === 'RECURRING'">per month</span>
                        <span ng-if="item.paymentType !== 'RECURRING'">one off costs</span>
                    </div>
                    
                        <p ng-if="item.link">
                            <a ng-href="{{item.link | checkForCdn }}" target="_blank">Learn more</a>
                        </p>
                    
                    <div class="cart-offer-control">
                        <button type="button" class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" ng-click="notificationCtrl.modal.productCallback(item.sku)">Add to cart</button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="cart-modal-buttons">
                <a ng-click="notificationCtrl.dismissModal(false)">No thanks</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    

        <div class="cart-product-modal">
            <div class="cart-offer-header">
                
                    <h3>{{ 'Let\'s update your cart' | replace: ':name':notificationCtrl.modal.name }}</h3>
                
                
                    <p>{{ 'But first one of the following is required in order to add this to your subscription' | replace: ':name':notificationCtrl.modal.name }}</p>
                
            </div>
            <div class="cart-offer-details" ng-class="{ 'cart-offer-multiple' : (notificationCtrl.modal.products && notificationCtrl.modal.products.length > 1)}">
                <div ng-repeat="item in notificationCtrl.modal.products track by $index" class="cart-offer">
                    <h4>{{item.name}}</h4>
                    <div ng-if="item.imageUrl && item.link" class="cart-offer-thumbnail">
                        <a ng-href="{{item.link | checkForCdn }}" target="_blank"><img ng-src="{{item.imageUrl | checkForCdn }}" ng-alt="{{item.name}}" /></a>
                    </div>
                    <div ng-if="item.imageUrl && !item.link" class="cart-offer-thumbnail">
                        <img ng-src="{{item.imageUrl | checkForCdn }}" ng-alt="{{item.name}}" /></a>
                    </div>
                    <div ng-if="item.price" class="cart-offer-price">
                        <span>{{item.price | currency:'$':2}}</span>
                        <span ng-if="item.paymentType === 'RECURRING'">per month</span>
                        <span ng-if="item.paymentType !== 'RECURRING'">one off costs</span>
                    </div>
                    
                        <p ng-if="item.link">
                            <a ng-href="{{item.link | checkForCdn }}" target="_blank">Learn more</a>
                        </p>
                    
                    <div class="cart-offer-control">
                        <button type="button" class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" ng-click="notificationCtrl.modal.productCallback(item.sku)">Add to cart</button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="cart-modal-buttons">
                <a ng-click="notificationCtrl.dismissModal(false)">No thanks</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    

        <div class="cart-free-modal">
            <div class="cart-offer-header">
                
                    <h3>Bonus!</h3>
                
                
            </div>
            <div class="cart-offer-details" ng-class="{ 'cart-offer-multiple' : (notificationCtrl.modal.products && notificationCtrl.modal.products.length > 1)}">
                <div ng-repeat="item in notificationCtrl.modal.products track by $index" class="cart-offer">
                    <h4>{{item.name}}</h4>
                    <div ng-if="item.imageUrl && item.link" class="cart-offer-thumbnail">
                        <a ng-href="{{item.link | checkForCdn }}" target="_blank"><img ng-src="{{item.imageUrl | checkForCdn }}" ng-alt="{{item.name}}" ></a>
                    </div>
                    <div ng-if="item.imageUrl && !item.link" class="cart-offer-thumbnail">
                        <img ng-src="{{item.imageUrl | checkForCdn }}" ng-alt="{{item.name}}" >
                    </div>
                    
                        <p ng-if="item.link">
                            <a ng-href="{{item.link | checkForCdn }}" target="_blank">Learn more</a>
                        </p>
                    
                    <div class="cart-offer-control">
                        <button type="button" class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" ng-click="notificationCtrl.modal.productCallback(item.sku)">Add to cart</button>
                    </div>
                    <div class="cart-offer-terms">
                        <p class="body-2" ng-if="item.terms" ng-bind-html="item.terms | htmlNewlines"></p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="cart-modal-buttons">
                <a ng-click="notificationCtrl.dismissModal(false)">No thanks</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    

            
                <h3>Your cart needs to be cleared</h3>
            
            
                <p>To take up this offer we must clear your current cart. Once the offer has been added to your cart you will need to re-add any additional services you would like to include with this order.</p>
            
            <div class="cart-modal-buttons">
                <button class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" type="button" ng-click="notificationCtrl.modal.clearCallback()">Yes clear my cart</button>
                <a ng-click="notificationCtrl.dismissModal(false)">No leave my current cart</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    

        <div class="cart-offer-modal">
            <div class="cart-offer-header">
                
                    <h3>Special offer!</h3>
                
                
                    <p>You may be interested in this great offer</p>
                
            </div>
            <div class="cart-offer-details with-slick" slick init-onload="true" clean-onload="true" data="notificationCtrl.modal.offersState" arrows="true" dots="false" slides-to-show="1" slides-to-scroll="1" touch-move="true" swipe-to-slide="true">
                <div ng-repeat="offer in notificationCtrl.modal.offers track by $index" class="cart-offer">
                    <div ng-if="offer.imageUrl && offer.link" class="cart-offer-thumbnail">
                        <a ng-href="{{offer.link | checkForCdn }}" target="_blank"><img ng-src="{{offer.imageUrl | checkForCdn }}" ng-alt="{{offer.name}}" /></a>
                    </div>
                    <div ng-if="offer.imageUrl && !offer.link" class="cart-offer-thumbnail">
                        <img ng-src="{{offer.imageUrl | checkForCdn }}" ng-alt="{{offer.name}}" />
                    </div>
                    <h4>{{offer.name}}</h4>
                    <p ng-if="offer.subheading" class="cart-offer-subheading">{{offer.subheading}}</p>
                    <p ng-if="offer.description" class="cart-offer-description" ng-bind-html="offer.description | htmlNewlines"></p>
                    <p ng-if="offer.terms" class="body-2" ng-bind-html="offer.terms | htmlNewlines"></p>
                    
                        <p ng-if="offer.link">
                            <a ng-href="{{offer.link | checkForCdn }}" target="_blank">See more details, terms and conditions</a>
                        </p>
                    
                    <div class="cart-offer-control">
                        <button type="button" class="iop-btn iop-btn-primary" ng-click="notificationCtrl.modal.offerCallback(offer.code)">Get this offer</button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="cart-modal-buttons">
                <a ng-click="notificationCtrl.dismissModal(false)">No thanks</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    

        <div class="decoder-select-modal">
            
                <h3>Which service would you like?</h3>
            
            <div class="container" cart-decoder="true" cart-decoder-callback="notificationCtrl.modal.adjustmentCallback"></div>
        </div>
    

        <div class="smartcard-select-modal">
            
                <h3>Which Box you would like this product added to?</h3>
            
            <button type="button" ng-repeat="decoder in ::notificationCtrl.modal.decoders track by $index" class="iop-btn iop-btn-secondary" ng-click="::notificationCtrl.modal.selectSmartCard(decoder.smartcardNumber)">
                {{ ::decoder.displayName }} <span ng-if="::decoder.decoderType">({{ ::decoder.marketingName }})</span><br/>
                <em>Smartcard No. {{ ::decoder.smartcardNumber }}</em>
            </button>
        </div>
    

        <div class="iop-decoder-select iop-contentcarosuel iop-has-links" ng-class="{'loading-active' : loading}">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="slick-track">
                    <div ng-repeat="decoder in decoders track by $index" class="grid-4 grid-mobile-4" ng-class="getSelected(decoder)">
                        <div ng-if="::decoder.imageUrl" class="iop-contentcarousel-image hide-mobile" background-image="{{ ::decoder.imageUrl | checkForCdn }}"><!-- --></div>
                        <div ng-if="::!decoder.imageUrl" class="iop-contentcarousel-image no-media iop-bg hide-mobile" ng-class="::getBrandColour($index)">
                            <span class="icon-iop icon-iop-sky"><!-- --></span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="iop-contentcarousel-title">
                            <h2>{{ ::decoder.name }}</h2>
                        </div>
                        <div class="iop-contentcarousel-content body-2 wysiwyg">
                             <h3 ng-if="::decoder.subheading">{{ ::decoder.subheading }}</h3>
                             <div html-list="::decoder.content"></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="iop-contentcarousel-meta">
                            <div ng-if="::decoder.sku" class="cart-product">
                                <p>
                                    <span class="product-price">{{ ::decoder.price | centsAsDollars }}</span>
                                    <span ng-if="::decoder.term" class="product-term">{{ ::decoder.term }}</span>
                                </p>
                                <p>
                                    <button type="button" class="iop-btn all-blacks" ng-class="getButtonCss(decoder)" ng-disabled="isSelected(decoder)" ng-click="select(decoder)">
                                        <span ng-if="isSelected(decoder)">Selected</span>
                                        <span ng-if="!isSelected(decoder)">Select</span>
                                    </button>
                                </p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="container">
                <div class="iop-contentcarosuel-spacer">
                    <hr />
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
